subject: Compatibility with Fanatec GT DD PRO
description_text:
Hello dear Simsonn Team

I have a Fanatec GT DD Pro Wheel Base and play on PC. Are the Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedals
compatible?? I read about EMI errors?? Regards Jan

conversations.body_text: Hi Anderas Welzenthal, We also have a Fanatec CSL DD 8Nm in our test setup, and it works well with our pedals. The wheelbase will not interfere with the pedal signal. We recommend using proper grounded 3-prong outlets for both your PC and power strip, with a reliable household earth/ground connection.

Thanks a lot, and if I buy the Ultra X pedals, do I also need the upgrade kit??? Or are the Ultra X pedals fully equipped??
Regards Jan
